definition: favorable location/in the right place/productivity of land
earth/ground/field/place/land/CL:片[pian4]
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
surname Li
sharp/favorable/advantage/benefit/profit/interest/to do good to/to benefit
Austria
the time is right, geographical and social conditions are favorable (idiom); a good time to go to war
pinyin: tian1 shi2 di4 li4 ren2 he2

definition: favorable geographical and social conditions (idiom); good location and the people satisfied
land use plan (official P.R.C. government term)
pinyin: tu3 di4 li4 yong4 gui1 hua4

sentences.english: The future variety trend of land use is analyzed applying location quotient.
sentences.chinese: 并应用区位商数分析了未来土地利用方式的变化趋势。

sentences.english: In addition, the arable land area in Wushuihe river basin was correspondently enlarged during the period of the past 15 years.
sentences.chinese: 从土地利用变化来看，舞水河流域耕地面积不断扩大。

sentences.english: Their source was Friedrich Hayek, in fact an Austrian.
sentences.chinese: 而实际上，海耶克是个奥地利人。

sentences.english: Icicles hang from a roof in Lofer, Austrian province of Salzburg.
sentences.chinese: 在奥地利萨尔茨堡的劳弗尔，冰柱挂在屋顶上。

sentences.english: Heaven and earth never agreed better to frame a place for man's habitation.
sentences.chinese: 天时地利，已造就最好的一个地方，给人居住。

sentences.english: Firstly, the mechanisms of the corridor effects of the urban transport artery on land use are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 城市交通干道对沿线土地利用存在廊道效应。

sentences.english: Analysis of space-time change of land use in Jingyan County.
sentences.chinese: 井研县土地利用时空变化分析。

sentences.english: In addition, a classification system and a set of interpretation keys for l…
sentences.chinese: 文中还详述了分类体系和土地利用调查的判读标志。

sentences.english: Effect of land use and land cover on soil nutrients.
sentences.chinese: 坝上地区土地利用与覆被变化对土壤养分的影响。

sentences.english: This Italian war memorial was just a few km's from the Austrian boarder.
sentences.chinese: 这是离奥地利边界仅仅几公里远的意大利战争纪念馆。

sentences.english: Primary Study on the Response of Hydrology on Land-Use Change in Miyun Watershed.
sentences.chinese: 密云水库流域土地利用变化水文响应初步研究。

sentences.english: Ruled at various times by Turkey and Austria, Banja Luka became part of Yugoslavia after World War I.
sentences.chinese: 不同时期曾先后由土耳其和奥地利统治。

sentences.english: On view of space, the biggest level of land use was Qindu area, the smallest Xunyi county;
sentences.chinese: 土地利用程度变化最大的是渭城区，最小的是彬县。

sentences.english: How Have Land-use Regulations Affected Property values in Oregon?
sentences.chinese: 俄勒冈土地利用条例怎样影响不动产价值？

sentences.english: The sun was slowly sinking in the west.
sentences.chinese: 太阳正慢慢地利西方沈落。

sentences.english: Austria is the home to the popular energy drink Red Bull.
sentences.chinese: 奥地利是受欢迎的功能饮料红牛的产地。

key moment/decisive opportunity
easily guarded, hard to attack

to rely on natural barriers (for one's defense)
to catch an enemy off guard with a surprise attack (idiom, from Sunzi's "The Art of War" 孫子兵法|孙子兵法[Sun1 zi3 Bing1 fa3])

definition: to guard/to hold a fortified position/entrenched
(to resist the enemy) relying on inaccessible territory
